channel.title: Getting Started on Bonk Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Bonk Docs

item.title: Installation
item.description: The simplest way of using Bonk is by including it in your C# project as a NuGet package. To include the latest version of Bonk in your project using the .NET CLI, use the following command: dotnet add package MoonTools.Core.Bonk If you are using the NuGet Package Manager, you may do: PM> Install-Package MoonTools.Core.Bonk Once you have done this, you may access Bonk functionality by including using MoonTools.Core.Bonk; in any C# file.
